about_the_game:
Take this thread of crimson red
Bear the burden of ash and blood
Ascend the seven sacred peaks
And bind thyself to the lost.

Guide Naginami as they ascend the enigmatic Yora in search of their beloved, Iza. In this 2.5D adventure, utilize the Crimson Thread, to swing, grapple, and pull your way through platforming challenges.



  • Encounter a myriad of distinctive creatures, each offering a unique approach to the base thread mechanics providing depth in your traversal options.
  • Cross paths with the six-eared fox, Kit, who weaves memories into the fabric of reality, revealing the bond between Naginami and Iza.
  • Traverse seven breathtaking peaks rich with symbolism and mystery, where every step forward brings you closer to understanding the profound connections that bind us all.
  • Unearth tales of the lost Ambi as you encounter the seven Goddess Statures that grant additional abilities to help you in your journey.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit) or SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 (4 * 3200)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 755M
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
